name: Re-Upload Baldis Basic Public Demo Windows X32-X64 Bits

description:

Hi guys, how are you :)? I bring you the (Baldis Basic Full Game Public demo) for 32 Bits, Re-uploaded, since mystman removed the page from the game. Pronto Resubire for MacOSX and Linux. ; D
